title: Ranked Teams
body:
Hi Riot,
Some feedback on the ranked system and queues ... The dynamic queue is great for solo/duo, however ...
Many of us are hating that queuing up as 5, in a team, affects your solo ranking rather than the team ranking.
This was better the way it was before, and I do not like that team ranks have gone.
Please bring back ranked teams - even if it uses the same queuing system, but recognises "hey, this is a team of 5 with team name XXXX" - lets affect their team rank instead".
Who agrees?
Thanks.
Regards,
Nick

replies.body: I believe they have plans of this nature after solo queue rolls out. It may be a while before any info comes out though. If they intended to remove teams entirely they would have done so when they released the new queue. Just hold out, they'll get something to us after they get solo queue out :) (at the very least some more info)
